title: Strengthening Business Practical Competencies: Asynchronous Online-Based University Faculty Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: University-level teaching experience and expertise in language education
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can apply at least three innovative teaching methodologies in language education settings through VR simulations
Learners independently explore instructional development topics for a minimum of three hours per week using asynchronous content
Learners complete and submit one instructional design project through a peer feedback system
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
